verbose_text: For mice that have been infected with PR8, we also compared the proportion of CD40L expressing CD8 + T cells in the lung, mediastinal lymph node, and spleen of the mice and found that CD8 + T cells that were localized in the lymph node and the spleen expressed higher amounts of CD40L as compared with those found in the lung, with the expression being the highest on the lymph node residents.
